definitions.definition: Any of the characteristics of ancient Greek culture, civilization, principles and ideals, including humanism , reason, the pursuit of knowledge and the arts, moderation and civic responsibility.
The national character or culture of Greece.
The culture and civilization of the Hellenistic period.

subdefinitions.definition: The admiration for and adoption of ancient Greek culture, ideas and civilization.

definitions.definition: A Greek idiom or turn of phrase.
The modern-day revival of the polytheistic religious system of Ancient Greece .

main_definition: Any of the characteristics of ancient Greek culture, civilization, principles and ideals, including humanism , reason, the pursuit of knowledge and the arts, moderation and civic responsibility.
secondary_definitions: The national character or culture of Greece.
The culture and civilization of the Hellenistic period.
A Greek idiom or turn of phrase.
The modern-day revival of the polytheistic religious system of Ancient Greece .
